title: Banner doesn't taked into account in native image
body:
### Describe the bug

I customized a banner throught the file banner.txt.
it's works well for an image compiled with 'mvn clean package'
It do'esnt works for an image compiled with 'mvn clean package -Pnative'

### Expected behavior

Having my banner when i launch the executable

### Actual behavior

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/43664834/113392cf-b440-43bc-81f1-e05e429bdb6f)


### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev
